sourcesContent:
export interface Category {
	id: number,
	title: string,
	items: []
}

export const categories = [
	{
		id: 1,
		title: 'Mobile Phones',
		items: [
			{
				id: 1,

				price: 648000,

				description: 'технология NFC: Да\n' +
					'цвет: фиолетовый\n' +
